entry.title: ABS-CBN helped Pampanga after Pinatubo eruption, says solon backing franchise | Teleradyo

media:group.media:title: ABS-CBN helped Pampanga after Pinatubo eruption, says solon backing franchise | Teleradyo
media:group.media:description:
The country's largest broadcaster spearheaded relief efforts and news coverage when the Pinatubo eruption buried the province in ash in June 1991 and when a typhoon in 1995 spawned deadly lahar, said Pampanga Third District Rep. Aurelio "Dong" Gonzales Jr.

entry.title: 'No basis in law': Solon refutes allegations vs Gabby Lopez's citizenship | Teleradyo

media:group.media:title: 'No basis in law': Solon refutes allegations vs Gabby Lopez's citizenship | Teleradyo
media:group.media:description:
MANILA - Allegations on ABS-CBN chairman emeritus Eugenio "Gabby" Lopez IIIâ€™s citizenship "have no basis in law," a lawmaker said Monday, as the lower chamber of Congress continued hearings on bills seeking a fresh 25-year franchise for the network.

entry.title: NTC Commissioner Cordoba attends House hearing on ABS-CBN franchise | ANC

media:group.media:title: NTC Commissioner Cordoba attends House hearing on ABS-CBN franchise | ANC
media:group.media:description:
Commissioner Gamaliel Cordoba of the National Telecommunications Commission on Monday joined the House of Representatives in its hearing of ABS-CBN franchise bills. The NTC issued a cease and desist order on May 5 after the network's franchise expired. The House earlier asked the NTC to issue a provisional permit that will allow ABS-CBN to operate while lawmakers deliberate on a longer franchise.

entry.title: Solicitor General Calida attends House hearing on ABS-CBN franchise | ANC

media:group.media:title: Solicitor General Calida attends House hearing on ABS-CBN franchise | ANC
media:group.media:description:
Solicitor General Jose Calida on Monday joined the House of Representatives' hearing on the ABS-CBN franchise. He previously declined to attend congressional hearings, citing the sub judice rule since he has filed a quo warranto petition against the network before the Supreme Court.

media:group.media:title: Transport dept says ready with contingency plan for first day of GCQ | ANC
media:group.media:description:

entry.title: PNR nag-abiso sa mga pasaherong agahan ang alis sa bahay dahil sa rules vs virus | Teleradyo

media:group.media:title: PNR nag-abiso sa mga pasaherong agahan ang alis sa bahay dahil sa rules vs virus | Teleradyo
media:group.media:description:
Inabisuhan ng Philippine National Railways ang mga pasahero nito, Lunes, na agahan ang alis sa kanilang mga tahanan at asahan ang mas mahabang pila sa mga istasyon dahil sa mga patakaran para pigilan ang pagkalat ng novel coronavirus.

entry.title: House to invite ABS-CBN's Gabby Lopez to next franchise hearing | Teleradyo

media:group.media:title: House to invite ABS-CBN's Gabby Lopez to next franchise hearing | Teleradyo
media:group.media:description:
Lawmakers will invite ABS-CBN Corp chairman emeritus Eugenio "Gabby" Lopez III to its next hearing on the network's proposed fresh franchise to answer questions about his citizenship, which the outfit had clarified in several instances.

entry.title: Gov't workers can continue work from home, 4-day work week as lockdown eases: CSC | Teleradyo

media:group.media:title: Gov't workers can continue work from home, 4-day work week as lockdown eases: CSC | Teleradyo
media:group.media:description:
Government workers may continue flexible arrangements like work-from-home, 4-day work week and skeletal force as the Philippines further eased its coronanavirus lockdown, the Civil Service Commission of the Philippines.
